lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that's okay; it'll grow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time jump, backwards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look handsome in any hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's up, guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glad you could join us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow, look at all that white and pink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looks like he is in Miami.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The white and pink contrasting with the fur is very confusing to my brain.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: (hum "Axel F")

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) No one watching is old enough to know what that thing is. Yeah, a few people do. And thank you. I know. All right, so first and foremost, let me get through our announcements real fast. Let's see. We have very few tickets left for the live show at GenCon, which we're excited for next week, guys; it's going to be a lot of fun. We're excited to meet everybody at GenCon. We have our campaign guide debuting there physically at the booth. We have a panel, we have a bunch of fun stuff coming up, so excited to see you guys out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to be so much fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see. Merch-wise. Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have something to show you guys. You just wait. Hey guys, why don't you roll that footage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The special Gilmore's Glorious QVC value of 24 gold pieces and 99 copper. That's right! Just "two and a half platinum pieces! But that offer only lasts until the disclosed amount of seconds "runs out on the timer in the corner. Scry now or come down and visit me, Gilmore, at Gilmore's Glorious "Goods in the Abdar's Promenade district of Emon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, these tarot cards? Hold on, let me open it up, since you didn't see enough of it in that amazing commercial.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, they're so shiny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam, tell us about the artist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the artist, Ioana Muresan, who is a long time Critter and has done a lot of art for our show, and we love her, and she did such a amazing job. Thank you. Look at this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go check them out. They're in the store right now. They're amazing. All of the other stuff that we had is still in the store, as well, including this fabulous necklace. And the posters shipped, so get ready to get them. Or maybe they're shipping tomorrow, something like that. I don't remember. But they're going out. And then the aprons are shipping at the end of next week, so you'll be getting those soon, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That new card smell. The gold gilding at the sides is so cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got gilding on the sides. Everything shines.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore's Glorious Gold Gilding. As a person who enjoys collecting cool major arcana, this makes me so happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, baby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to play. I'm just gonna look at these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Ioana Muresan. Your work is amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Critical Role podcast up to episode 30 is available. We're working tight on the next batch of ten. Will have announcements very soon for that. Let's see. People who are Alpha users, we have all the back episodes of Critical Role, all the way up from one to 107 available on Alpha. They retroactively added all the bells and whistles, HP trackers, all that fun stuff, conditions, all the little fun things for the entire show. They just finished it. So you have that waiting for you if you ever wanted to binge again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a reference that nobody in the audience got.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even understand that reference, bro.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know how much older than you I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Let's see. Do we have a Talks Machina next week?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we left off, so to begin this fray: Where are you guys placed, currently? Percival, you would probably be right about where that guy emerged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would probably be about there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were on the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had my boots on, so I was up by his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so we'll put you there. Oh god. Here you go. Grog was by the smelter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I had been looking at the thing. The big empty pyramid triangle thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you'd be over in this area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like I was with Vex, maybe on the other side. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was on my broom, because I had been hovering looking at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. So you'd probably be about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About there, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that I had just poofed the wings out and I think I was inspecting one of the big metal men before it came out of the wall. I don't really remember which.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most likely one of the ones that was not attended by another member of the party. So we'll say about here. And Scanlan, whereabouts were you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And now I'm not as beautiful. So put me near the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Near the door? So we'll put you over in this one here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So all of their faces are indented?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, each one of them, as opposed to the other warriors you saw in the chambers that led down into this area, have no faces. Instead where you see are an empty void triangular like the large seal, but vacuous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But matches the same shape?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They didn't Man-E-Faces around? I'm misremembering that? Maybe I just really like Man-E-Faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is a good thing. But regardless, I would like you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not so soon! (grumbling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is their head height about the same height as the seal and the crossbeams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The seal is a little bit higher than where their heads are. All right, so 25 to 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have Grog. 15 to ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Keyleth, what'd you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five. I don't want to talk about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that being the case. As these large metallic warriors are emerging from the sides of the chamber, wrenching the large metal blades, these large rectangular almost slab-like swords, bladed on each side, Vex, you're up first. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you do, hot shot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to attack them. I'm going to attack the one next to Percy. Attack-style. I'm going to Hunter's Mark him and then I'm going to attack him. I'm going to do this, and then this, and then this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are things like this considered? Creatures or golems?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constructs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, yeah, so you do actually pull back the arrow and it strikes true. However, the armored plating is so strong that the arrow shatters across the front of its armored chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! I do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, second shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well that's good. Oh my god, I'm going to scream. Yeah, I know, bro. You're not bro, you're hubby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She called me "bro." Game of Thrones is obviously back on the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14. Don't say other numbers! 14 plus seven is 21. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage. All righty. And are you going to stay wherever you are, or do you want to move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How high is the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ceiling is about 30 feet up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to fly up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to go to the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're going to go all the way up to the roof?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was two points of lightning damage. Because they're made of metal. I don't know if that did anything special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So ending your turn, that brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. To start, am I within striking range of him if I back up a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you back up a little bit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Do I need to disengage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently engaged with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that I'm that close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You were inspecting it as he emerged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use my bonus action to Hunter's Mark him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I'm going to stick him in the face is what I'm going to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, I get 3d6 of sneak attack now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you haven't been marking that, yeah. You should do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An extra four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's 30 for the first. And for the second. 30 for both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 for both hits?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, because I'm at advantage because I'm going before them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So both hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So the first one, which will get the sneak attack fun, is ten plus psychic damage is 16 plus sneak attack damage. (counting) 38 for the first. Plus Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus another d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. Is one plus the Hunter's Mark again, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only Hunter's Mark once on your attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's only for one attack? Because I don't use it all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding. It's Hunter's Mark every time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, I know that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So five for the second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sneak attack's only once but Hunter's Mark is every time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, whenever you hit it with a weapon. All right. So what's that second one you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five? All right. Got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! That's not true, sorry. 11. Because it's not an offhand attack, it's my second paladin attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's correct. There you go. 11. Boom. All righty. And you're going to stay put, or you're going to move somewhere?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to risk an attack while I'm not hasted. I'm going to risk an attack and back up about ten and go up another 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they can't throw those greatswords, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't give him ideas. Stop it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can't be paralyzed or restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Helps a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So you're also just about at the ceiling with her. As you shoot up and away, it strikes up quickly after your daggers have been carving into its armor. Its blade comes up in a wide arc against you. That is an 18 plus 12. 30.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18 plus 12? Just barely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Do we still have our Death Ward on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, thank you for reminding me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And our Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're pretty metal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 points of slashing damage as the blade rakes across the front of your chest and forces you back even further. Your shoulders end up slamming into the ceiling from the impact of both you retracting back and the blow itself. Your wings have to catch you for a second and you're keeping yourself elevated at the moment. Finishing your turn there. That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Standing by the blacksmithing stuff, I say, you are interrupting Grog's arts and crafts! And I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Into a rage you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I would like to charge at that little bastard right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here on its own?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up into his face you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up into your face!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get him, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 29 is not terrible. Did you know that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, that's good. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damage? All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second one. Reckless, great weapon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just because. That's a million. That's 34 minus five is 29!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34 minus five? Nice, that hits!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five, nine, 21, 31. 31 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 points of damage. Fantastic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that ends my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am engaged. I know, there's nothing I can do. I am engaged with that thing, aren't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he doesn't see you because you're above him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You technically triggered it. It's seemingly aware of your presence. In fact, the moment you say that, you watch as the metallic head goes (creak) and looks up right to you, that creepy triangular void staring right at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think you can dispel their magic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I'm going to try and take a run in the other direction. I know it's going to take a swing at me. Yep, I'm running down the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way, to the corner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, as far as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about as far as you can get on that wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll start coming that way, too. Not a full-- it's six spaces., so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So at that point you'll be about there. All righty. It does swing at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19 just hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19's your AC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: AC's 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Escher man is down! I love being able to see everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34 points of slashing damage. Which almost cleaves you off the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 34 points? Okay, so hold on, let me do the math on that. (counting) Okay, yeah, I'm at 151 because I had a whole bunch of temporary points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're running along the wall, it hits you from behind and for a second you feel the urge to black out and you fight through it and keep running. You can feel the warm spreading on the back of your shoulder blades from the blow, and you careen around that corner and stop, spinning to survey the room. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First thing is I'm going to try and get him to drop the sword. That's a 34 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength save against a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That is a 13.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drop your sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as its broken finger (clicks) snaps back into place and it looks back at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that was shot number one. Oh boy, here we go! I've also got to do damage on that, which is-- I'm so sorry, where are all my dice? There we are. Oh, I didn't do that, so none of that. Where are we going? I'm going to drop three points of Cabal into this, as well. Oh, there we are. Six points of psychic damage, four points of lightning damage, and 16 points of standard piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you. And which weapon's this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Animus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Perfect. All right, so (boom) the finger curls back and breaks into place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next thing I'm going to do, I'm going to cast Hex on him. Give him disadvantage on strength saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, strength ability checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength ability checks. And I'm going to take a sharpshooter shot. That's 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 just barely hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, good to know! Making that note. So I'm going to drop three more points of Cabal into that, so that's 20 points of piercing damage, four points of psychic damage, 13 points of lightning damage, and three points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy's turned into Rambo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the second one you watch as one of its armored shoulder plates dents inward from the impact, and there's a small pierced hole in the center where it seems to have blasted through its armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And last shot. I'm going to try and push him ten feet back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should have done damage. There's no damage on a push shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he got pushed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he got pushed ten feet back. And hey, I get a grit point back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah man, when we got pushed in the playground, that got in your head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So he's got to move ten feet before he can pick up his sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that ends your turn? All right, it is now their turn. So the one that you just blasted back, as it skids to a halt, almost slams against the wall, it looks over at you across the way and then looks around and surveys the room quickly with its strange triangular vapid lack-of-a-face. Glances up and sees Vex'ahlia on the broom above. Goes into a full leap to push with its feet off the wall and attempt to grab towards you in the middle of the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. It can jump that high?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a WWE cage match.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half the size of the room, practically, in height.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This could be real bad. We might get total-partied right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'm making this a grapple check, so roll either acrobatics or athletics.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whichever one's better. Acrobatics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crash) Straight over, prone into the coals, landing at the side of them right there. The broom goes clattering off to the side. It's still chained to you from the apparatus that you placed, and it scatters across the stonework a couple of feet from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was just going to slam you into the ground!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's going to hurt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 19 points of bludgeoning damage from the impact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember you have the temporary hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then ten points of fire damage from being slammed into the coals. You are considered on fire. You need to take an action to put it out or you take 1d10 damage every turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) You whip your hair back and forth. (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, its sword-- and I'll go ahead and use this as a marker-- the sword is on the ground right there. So it can't use that right now. The other two can! So this one over there that got shot by you and flew away, as it arcs up, it's starting to look around to see if it can gain any real intent to go towards you and then glances off to the side and instead sees the smaller targets, the softer, easier-to-get-to druid and gnome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a fool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bring it, bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns to engage both of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the coal pit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to stop partway through there, and it's going to go right up there. You watch as underneath the head, the armor part in the chest suddenly hinges open, and you see this bright burning furnace in the center of its chest that (boom) lets out this extremely white-hot burning angry torrent of flame.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I cast Cutting Words, or can I use Cutting Words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if it's going to do anything, but sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can reduce damage. Because Cutting Words can reduce damage on an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only by a little. I want him to miss, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's going to hit regardless. You guys have to make saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a cone. It's just going to hit us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be about there. Get all of you, including the other guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I'm prone do I still get to roll to roll through the coals to avoid it or some shit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, hide yourself under the coals.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Yeah. Like the McDonald's ball pit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not get disadvantage on saving throws, so you can still continue to roll. I need Scanlan and Keyleth and Vex to all make dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a hypodermic needle in here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How very Santa Monica.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, keep hitting the mic. Just dex saving throws?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are you pointing to me? Oh! I have this dice. It's the first time I've ever used it. It has poop on it; someone sent me poop dice, and I think I just rolled a natural 20 because I rolled the poop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's on the other side of the poop?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other side is a skull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's a one, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think for you, you count the poop as a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is poop 20 or is poop one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think poop is normally one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's next to the poop? What other numbers are near it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19, 13, and seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's a one. Two ones on that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got a one, as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I rolled a three, so I'm at seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so Keyleth and Scanlan, you both from the chest furnace take 38 point of fire damage as it burns out in front of it. You take half that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Which is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 19 points of fire damage to you. And the flames burn across the other armored individual, the giant construct, and you watch as some of its damaged form begins to seal up from the flames.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flames help it. Fire heals them. Cold damage. Do cold damage!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fire bad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fire good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said minus 38, right?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: No, it's already got a pyramid in it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to put all three into the one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds like a plan. Can I go over and archaically remove the other two noggins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I assist by holding the bodies with Bigby's Hand while you pull the heads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually. Make a strength check with advantage, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so with Bigby's Hand wrapping around the body, clutching it like an action figure, you very easily (crack) pop the head off, and you now have two disembodied heads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One more. Do you want to help me with this one, too? Yeah! What's wrong with your voice? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. (groaning) It takes a little while, and it pulls off, but it's mildly deformed from being pulled off. It seems like the hole in the face is intact. It took so hard a try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got the ashtrays.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do. Let's try this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. We head over to the smelting apparati.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you walk on over, and it's a small furnace built in there with extremely hot coals, and it seems to be an influx of perpetual heat, but there's a large bellows next to it that you can use to try and increase the heat there for a temporary, short time, and you once again, strangely, you look over to it and you know exactly how this works, like you've always worked with it before. So the flames that were a burning orange-red, extremely hot, begin to flare into bright yellow and white in places. And the heat emanating from it is enough that it causes a lot of you to get uncomfortable in the presence and you have to take a step back, Grog enduring it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still a fire hydrant. Keyleth is on fire marshal duty. I do some misting, like at Six Flags to cool off Vex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't just run through you, like Universal City Walk or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's really all I'm going for. I turned into an elemental. I've got to do something with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a check with your blacksmithing tools, which is your proficiency modifier, and we'll say for this, because it is more of a dextrous use of this skill, add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It fills to the very edge. Some of it spills over, but you can easily snip that off. As you wait for it to cool, which you can probably help with, actually, as there is no basin for quenching the metal at the moment, so the steam (whoosh) rises up all around, and you turn the heads over, and each one (sliding sound) leaves these heavy metallic pyramid pieces that are smooth and perfect on three of the sides, and one of them appears to be almost like a broken crystal on the inside. It's a shattered, messed-up section.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Puzzle piece! Got to fit them together!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so if we fit these together--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem to fit together very well; you figured it out very quickly, they fit and hold together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With the jaggedy ends, or with the smooth ends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The jaggedy ends all fit together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this now make another concave piece?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All together, it makes a pyramid that comes to a central point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) Let's put it in the big thing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I've still got some Spider Climb, so I'm going to grab one and lift up. All the fliers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the three of you make it up, fit it together, push it in. It fits in perfectly. Slips in. You all back up... nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We push it in harder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is definitely going to be really good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I push on my sister's shoulder blades.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you guys (groans) get behind and shove, push. Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Grog, you try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run across the coal pits and Superman punch the pyramid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I barrel-roll out of the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rage before I do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Jesus. There's a dent in it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get advantage on this, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I was hoping for. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact noise) The impact on this causes the whole room to shake almost, from the blast. You hear the echo right up the stairs in the hallway that you emerged from, you can hear continuing as it slowly dissipates in the distance. You land, and you can see there's actually a knuckle mark in the platinum from the impact. No effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I've got an idea. What if we take this thing off of the cross beams, right? And stick it in the coals, or something. Because why are the coals here, right underneath it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop water elemental form. You think it needs to be hot first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look up, I line up the apparatus and look across the room, does it feel like there's any other Indiana Jones--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stairway is in the way. Because the stairway doesn't come all the way to the top of the ceiling, and then back here it blocks this passage between the two of them, but as you go and look, all it is is the reddish, rust colored cross-beams that are bolted against the wall, and in the center there's the round golden crest with the triangle shape which is now filled with the platinum key that you've made.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are the coals hot or are the coals cold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The coals are currently now cold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we try turning it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, good idea! But we should reignite these coals, because I think it's bad that they've burned down right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so, too. Just to test, yeah, I'm going to do Burning Hands. How quickly do they catch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty quickly. And you get the sense that they were slowly catching, anyway; there's something about them, the heat that the general room perpetually emanates maintains the fires within. But your flame with the burning hands very quickly elevates and quickens that process, and you watch as the coals now glow to a bright orange-red hue, and you can feel the heat emanating from them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we turn the circle? Does it move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go up to the edge and you grab the edge of the golden crest and tug! And it's not moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gosh darn it! What are we supposed to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any inlays?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. It's not my strong point. Goddamn it, that's like the fourth three I've rolled today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you're inspired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) You are inspired. Up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Better. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. It's smooth gold, there's no signs or runes or anything on the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see if there's anything in the holes that were left by the soldiers who left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The three suits of armor came out of the wall, so there's now a wall that we haven't seen behind them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's supposed to be gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Platinum is for the trammels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you go ahead and look inside which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do all three, but I'll start on the one on the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's investigation check. What did you do? Six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that also a three?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's also a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look around inside and the shape is a perfect indentation of the physical form of the three metal warriors. You don't see any signs of anything beyond enough of a cavity to fit them snugly when they're dormant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey Scanlan? You want to use your dragon fisting friend to put that pyramid in the coals and heat it up and then shove it back in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to use Bigby's Hand to take that pyramid, shove it in the coals, heat it up, and see if that makes a difference, shove it back in hot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you want me to heat the platinum and then shove into the guy's face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bigby's Hand, by the way, at this time has faded. It only lasts for a minute with concentration. The spell has faded.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, maybe the pyramid heated up could make a difference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I walk up into the coals, take the platinum pyramid out, and I'll drop it down into the coals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's about 15 feet up off the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Can I jump, Boots of Feral Leaping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. I'd say you leap up and grab the edges of the seal with your giant strength, and wedge your fingers in the side and pull it out and land on the coals. You do take four points of fire damage as the coals begin to burn into your feet and the proximity of the heat. But you back up out of the coal based center now holding the key.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I drop it in the coals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the three pieces come apart as soon as you pull it from the section, so you have the three different pieces right there in your arms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So when three pieces go together the part that goes towards the wall--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's another point. It's like a four-sided pyramid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, it is a pyramid, so the whole pyramid goes in the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a flat seal on the outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think this needs to be gold, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would it be gold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, the outside is gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe the platinum is only for the trammels, not the key.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can try it. We have gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Finish my stupid idea, and then we'll move onto the next stupid one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has the platinum pyramid started to heat up yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding it in your arms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I drop it in the coals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You drop it in the coals. You wait about five minutes or so, and you can see a faint bit of heated glow slowly heating up, but these coals are not smelter ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, I feel like, I feel like, this is stupid. I pick them up. (pained gasps) Tell me where they go

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an intelligence check, Grog, to assemble the three puzzle pieces of the key.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Negative two. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He's having a hard time putting those pieces together, guys!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fly over, I'm Deathwalker's Warded to fire and I'm going to start helping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Asshole! Son of a bitch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to fucking try it in gold! Try it in gold. Maybe try it in gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have one other thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the red armor made out of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) What are the armors made out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a dark, reddish-black metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we melt the golems into their heads?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Melt each one. Maybe it's got to be the metal they're made out of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The triangles are like this big and the armor is like massive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so take some of the metal and melt it down into the head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is the metal? Can we do a check to see what kind of metal it is, what it's made out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Either of these guys can attempt to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can take a look. What would that be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be an intelligence check plus your tinkering benefit, intelligence check plus your blacksmithing proficiency modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's intelligence plus my normal tinker check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's not bad. Let's see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wow! That's 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So both of you say out loud at the same time, "Oh, this is volcanic glass metal."

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Volcanic glass metal. Aha!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe can we melt it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only in a glass volcano. No, I think it will melt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I know if volcanic--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) It's a type of metal--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a type of metal--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're following me on this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm following you on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's an oxidized red iron base that in the construct and the folding of the metal, to build the actual armored structure of these creatures, had bits of volcanic glass folded into the actual metal as it was created.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like that makes it special.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Bring on the Night King.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can give it a shot, can't we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Melt them down into each of the three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't you make their dreams come true and rip their groins off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Melt their body into their face and make triangles out of the metal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so because you rolled a very high check, I'll let you know, that generally heating up a metal to the point in which it's liquid and then pouring it into the same metal is going to mess up the mold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have felt very foolish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are so smart about this stuff, then we should do gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It comes, it comes in waves. It's like a new awakening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll try the gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so about a hundred gold pieces per head. So 300 gold pieces removed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, how come it was 300? Oh, it's not the same worth, it's the coin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's a hundred gold pieces per face. So it's 300 gold pieces total. So 300 gold taken off, total. You smelt it down, same process, and then place within each of the three molds, wait for it to cool and then you remove the three key pieces of the solid gold. They all fit together just as the platinum pieces did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can somebody go pull that thing out, and then I will put this one in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pulling it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you go ahead and you pull out the chunks of heated, now cooling platinum and drop them into the coals for a moment. You pull them off the coals, carefully.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run up and MJ the new gold pyramid into the--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An intelligence check? Oh, because I got to put them together. Two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is having a hard time with that. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm making an origami swan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, you guys eventually help him put it together a second time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a really good macaroni art you've made. It's so good. That's a boat, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's put it in the key.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as they have it assembled, you rush up, leap jam it in up there and it slides into place. You hear a heavy slamming sound and what sounds like the scraping of heavy chain mail. (metallic scraping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab the platinum pyramid and I put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I already said that I had them. No. No, he doesn't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: as it falls to rest onto the ground and you see the wall slowly rise up. (grinding gears)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. I want to prep something. Hide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so who's hiding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm hiding behind the pillar that I'm next to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you hide behind there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, face death with me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is bullshit. I'm going to stand there, hands on hips.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hug the wall closest to the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just going to reveal another stairway, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be another door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you guys see National Treasure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I never saw National Treasure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's so good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, well we'll make an evening of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Nick Cage at his most mediocre.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: St. Nicholas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see small streams of glowing orange molten rock within the chamber, which is slightly down and before you. Looks like two small ten-foot-wide rivers of molten rock, metal-- you can't quite tell from here, but it's glowing orange and red, and they both convene and go dark in the center where it looks like they are being covered or obscured by something that you can't quite make out at this distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A giant anvil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, anybody who wants to glance in. Right now, the only people who can look in would not be Percival and Vax because they are in the way back, and Keyleth is hiding, if you want to glance in the side you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do a peek?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sound is creepy as fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, it's a lot of sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the smoke begins to dissipate even further, more visibility reveals the shape of this object to definitely be that of an anvil. You can see a number of chains that are linked to it on each side that dangle off the edge. You cannot quite see what's at the end of these chains; they're falling off the side of this platform and out of view. You'd have to get closer to see what they are. However, the shape that you now see, right behind this platform, looming at about 20 feet tall from your estimation at this distance, Keyleth, as you are the one who sees this before anybody else does. You see a stocky humanoid form that is looming over the anvil, both of its fists resting on each side of the platform. You can see its trunk-like arms and legs are dark gray stone, and the head carries no face; it is a smooth absence of face. You can see red cables that dangle from the top and the back of the head that are then pulled together in the back like a ponytail, and around the center of its torso and its lower body, these extremely thick layers of leather wrap that make a kilt that dangles past the knees of this giant stone structure that stands there looming over. In one of its hands you see a comparably small but impressive-looking hammer of gold and black that is currently chained to the platform. It's the one that isn't currently dangling off the side. It's in its hand and it's resting there. And you can see the heat emanating from both the pools of molten rocks on the side of it and the flames behind. Most of the imagery is perpetually shifting and being altered by the sheer volume of heat that this chamber holds. This is apparently the Core Anvil, and whatever decor around it looks very intimidating. What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The humanoid figure doesn't seem to have noticed us? He's not moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not moving. It's standing there right at the platform.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Over the anvil?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that sound still happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the figure is 20 feet fall, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You don't see the ceiling in here, because it's all filled with black smoke.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see the source of the sound? Can we see what's causing that yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't right now. It's behind that entity, and you see behind where the platform is, the darkened back portion of the chamber, these two flashes of spark and flame. As they do, you see bursts of smoke and flame billow up and continue to fill and feed the ceiling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I convey what I see. I think you might have a guardian you have to fight over that hammer, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I creep up past my sister and place a hand on his knee, which is in my fucking face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we can take 60 seconds, I back up into a corner and start casting Conjure Elemental and conjure another water elemental to be on our side, from the staff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's a friendly giant really creepy-looking entity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he's the guy who tried to use the anvil before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's the Allfather. Is that what he's called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allhammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, look. Before we step into that arena, we control this space. How quick and quiet can you be, to see if he responds to your movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can get in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In and out, super fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. You want me to get a look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. See if he reacts to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dart up to him and go (taunting) and then dart back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. We might want to be careful about getting too high. There's a lot of smoke in there; we don't want to suffocate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're live on the fucking internet, Sam Riegel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hope your mom's watching.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks for watching everybody, that's the end of tonight's show. Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you add any of your secret sauce to my sneaking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to stay within a certain radius of her to get the effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never mind, I'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do it. This is what you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just fly in really fast. Be creepy and quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I need to do an additional stealth? Creepy is automatic. It's a given.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't even notice him leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see two large pillars to each side of you that have these red rocks embedded in the side that give this faint red glow that gives a hint of light to the chamber. There's the heat from the pools. The whole chamber in here is very uncomfortable for you. Thankfully, your armor giving you heat resistance does help a bit. You can see the anvil on top of the staircase on the raised platform and that large hulking entity that's looming over it at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If he's here and I'm over here, can I fly up just there so I can see the front of him a bit? The angle of his face, if there is one, anything to see? Or is he facing out towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's facing out towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never mind then. Shoot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got fuzz on your face. Can I get it? No, you got it. It was right on his lip, so every time he talked--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be bold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Float in space and do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You fly up? That is

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever you want to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I stealthily get his attention by waving my hand in his face."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a difference between stalking off in the corner and flying up into the center to get a look and then seeing if he sees you. So what are you doing? You have to distinguish that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you pick this fuzz off my face? I couldn't get it off the whole time, it just keeps re-affixing. I don't know. I flew in and out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to get his attention somehow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got to be you, because you're so fast. If you get his attention you can dart out really fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what do we think we're doing here? Are we talking to this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we try talking to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a crazy plan, but it just might work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can speak Celestial, too, right? You don't just read it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, Swedish Chef over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we now have, as Exandria canon, that Celestial sounds like Swedish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can bury that as deep as you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for that, Taliesin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought Celestial sounded more like singing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you know, it's like a whole thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I get another quick re-rundown of the room? So he was up at the top of the stairs, facing out, not moving and was that wall behind him, or does it go further past him at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say about 15 feet behind him you can see the occasional reflection of the flashes of light, where it looks to be there is a wall behind him. There is an end to the chamber, but you're too far away and it's too obscured by smoke for you to know exactly what's behind him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And when I got in there, I didn't get close enough to see if there was any good hiding spots beyond him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. There are corners to the chamber. As you fly up and glance you can see two more small equal-sized pits of coals, behind him on either side, and you do glance, two 20-foot-wide domed machines that you see the flame and the billowing smoke are being pushed out of. It's a weird engine-like structure with two of them behind it, that you can see the flames. (hammering) And that's where the sparks are shooting out of each time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do the talking thing, I'm going to go back in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we start, how long has it been since we entered this chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been maybe ten minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Entered into the volcano.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, into the volcano?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to find out if Freedom of Movement is still on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, with all of the smelting, put together I'd say it's probably been close to an hour.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I only have one condition effect on him? Or can I stack them up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can have as many as you put on him. If they're not concentration, you can stack as many as you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Freedom of Movement is not. I'm going to cast Freedom of Movement on you again, and then I think Enhance Ability is, though, so I'm going to use my concentration to give you Cat's Grace, right? You were using dexterity for the smelting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's would be dex or strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For most blacksmithing, you gather that it will be dex or strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, strength is way better than dex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'll give you Cat's Grace. You have advantage on dex checks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And DM. How long were we in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that room? Since you entered that chamber it's been about an hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's been an hour? My wings then are--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, yeah, your wings have now dissipated.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, I'm not afraid, go talk to this thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to say it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shout it into the chamber?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello? We come seeking the Allhammer. We need help. Vecna walks the earth again. We come seeking a way to defeat him once again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell him we were sent by Pelor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We come with the blessings of Pelor. And I'm going to start entering, very gingerly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm right behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So Percival is entering--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Actually, I'll throw out that I crept back in ahead of that, so in there, hiding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm floating behind him on a broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Scanlan, where are you coming in on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will lag behind Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we have Percival walking in, and who is right behind Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, all righty. Scanlan right behind Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it have to be single file with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it doesn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to be back over to the side of Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take up the rears with my water elemental.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ground is still super duper hot, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ground is, yes. All righty. So as you begin to enter the chamber and make your way towards the stairway and this central, raised platform with the two flaming pillars that flank it. Shouting this into the chamber, it echoes through, and you still hear the (hammering). Each flash of light causes this faint glow across your faces and the faces of your companions as their shapes go from dark obscured in the shadow and smoke into a brief reveal of your form. As you begin to approach the stairs, you hear this faint grinding of stone as the faceless giant's head slowly looks up to face you. But that's all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I keep walking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys continue to walk, you get to the bottom of the stairs, and you watch as one of its hands on the side that clutches the hammer unfurls and releases it and the hammer, once let go, swings, the chain going taut and it slams into the side of the raised platform out of sight and as it does, it stands up and rights itself, but its head is still looking down at you, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We ask permission to use the anvil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell him, nod yes. Once for yes and shake his head no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about this? I'm not afraid. If he takes offense, I'll take it better than most.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So do you ascend the stairs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am in the front now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you take your first couple steps onto the stairs. As you do, the large stone entity spins around and steps into the smoke that obscures its shoulders--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on myself one more time, while this is happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to down a potion. And then a quick question, too. Hunter's Mark has a duration of an hour, but since that last battle lapsed, am I then not allowed to slide it to this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's gone now. It has been more time-- the process of smelting and then re-smelting and figuring out and adjusting everything, it has taken over an hour, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Second Wind? Just because.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, I could really use Spider Climb right now, goddamn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heal 13 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So as you continue to step up the stairs. Grog, as you approach, you get about a third of the way up there and you hear what sounds like heavy metal scraping against stone and one giant burst of sound. You watch as the giant figure shifts and turns back out of the smoke, holding across its front in one hand a large cleaver-like blade with runes glowing across the side of it. About 15 feet or so from end to end, and as it spins, it looks down towards you all and holds it in front, the flat end facing out towards you in a ceremonial way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What kind of runes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe if you use it the right way, it will be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they runes or a language? Is it a script?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are specifically arcane runes of an enchantment-type nature. It's holding the blade out in front like that, clutching the handle on one side and putting its hand against the flat of the blade in the other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have our bits of god?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We might want to have them available for the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I take mine out of my pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, go up to the top? You make it to the very top of the stairs, and there is the anvil there before you, and the heat you can feel. You know when you're close to an explosion and there's that brief minute of extremely uncomfortable heat that you flinch? It's that, perpetually and all of you are sweating masses beneath your armor. You're afraid at certain points that your eyebrows are beginning to singe and curl. It's hard to breathe because the air is so hot and so thick, and occasionally you can't help but find yourself coughing at the caustic black smoke that fills a large portion of the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am consciously checking my beard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you approach the top of the stairs, the head looks down at you. What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I standing at the anvil now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're standing right at the edge of the stairs, the very top of the platform, and the anvil's maybe five feet in front of you. You can see all the chains that are hanging on the side and dangling off the sides of the platform.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see where the chains are leading or are they just dangling off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The platform is about 20 feet wide and so the chains that are all hooked at multiple places to the edges and the outside part of the anvil are taut and then dangling off the edge of the platform. So you can't see where it goes. You know one of them is the hammer, because that's what he let fly off the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kept track of which one was the hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me the platinum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks. With the platinum, I will approach the anvil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does, the blade tilts so that now, as opposed to the flat facing you, one of the two bladed edges is now--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In your vision of how to do it, did you see this guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I? No. Do I see any blacksmithing tools, anything that I would use to hammer this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The hammer that he let go of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's hanging off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw that, but you didn't get a great look at it by the time it was chucked off the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Flat. Edge. That does feel like a ready, set.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take one step back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade goes to a flat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So next, after the edge, is decapitation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure that would be 150 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you go and try to pick up that hammer first? Do you need it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm picturing the anvil right in front of me and he's off to the side, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The anvil is right in front of you. He's on the other side of the anvil. You only see the upper part of the torso because he's standing off the platform below it. So you see him from the waist up; he's about 20 feet tall from top to bottom, you only see ten feet of his torso there. The blade's out in front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the hammer is somewhere between me and him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Make a perception check to see if you remember which chain it was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's four chains on each side that are dangling off the side, and you are not sure which one it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it went hanging off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It went held off the side, so now there are four chains that are taut on each side of the anvil that are vanishing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he another golem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have seen golems and you have encountered golems before, and the constructs of them can vary. This one, elements of it have the same proportions of a golem, but there are elements that seem more human-like as opposed to an armored battering ram. The refined details of it-- no, your perception roll isn't high enough and you're too far away to make out much more of its form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is his sword as big as our table is across?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what if we show him one of our little beans?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I pulled mine out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you have to show him how good a blacksmith you are to earn the privilege.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I've got to get to the anvil to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the blade in his hand, just the blade from hilt to end is about 15 feet long.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, can you read the arcane runes on his sword? Do you know what this enchantment is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can certainly try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check, Scanlan, as you glance over, stepping into the edge of the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's purely based on his knowledge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got this Scanlan! Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is arcana?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, vacation Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. The runes across the blade specifically deal with cursing the physical form of what touches its blade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Okay, cool. Instead of walking towards the anvil, can I start walking to the right, towards one of those chains that's dangling on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chains are immediately to the left and right of the anvil, so to go towards the chain you'd be stepping closer to the anvil, and as you turn to the side its head tracks you as you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it tilting it down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't moved forward, so no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Can I keep moving in that direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you begin to step forward towards the chain. The blade comes down to a flat end towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and sneak around the side of it. What's behind it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing over, what you can see between the smoke, you see the two pits of burning coals to the-- behind, right and left of it, with small steps that lead into the coals on each side and you see the two edges of these large, cylindrical turbines of stone and metal where the impacts are and the flames flickering off it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are those bellows or is it more complicated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure. A lot of it is obscured from the smoke that's spilling out of it and you're too far and the light's too dark in here, from that distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What would happen if we put that machine out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you have to heat the metal first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if we put the water elemental in the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just going to say. I'm going to come into the room a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you step in. Most of you are at the base of the stairs. Grog is at the top of the stairs. Scanlan stepped up behind him to look at the runes on the blade. That's where you currently reside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is his eyesight still trained on Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to send my water elemental forward and see if it attracts its attention, since it's not a mortal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you send it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards the anvil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you head up the stairs. The water elemental swarms around the side. You see wherever it moves forward there's steam pouring off from the heat of the ground and the surrounding metal and stone. As it comes up the steps, more and more steam (sizzling) emerging off the back of its body, it comes to the top and it's now next to Grog. You send it towards the anvil?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but didn't Grog train to the right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog stepped to the right and then began to step forward and then stopped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the water elemental seem to be catching its attention at all, or is it still looking at Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still looking at Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move the elemental to the left to see if it follows the elemental?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the elemental moves to the left. It doesn't follow the elemental.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wouldn't send him any closer to the anvil, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, he might swing at the thing if it got closer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm wondering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might send him in attack mode.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So unless we're short on ideas, we might have to starburst this thing. Scatter it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who forged here before? What god?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Allhammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ioun helped, Pelor helped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, should we show our god shit? Did we do that yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, I'm going to fly up next to Grog, but I'm not going to go past him, and I'm going to hold up the little bead of power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. His attention focuses in between the two of you. Doesn't change his stance; the blade is still tilted down towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step one step forward with it, no further than Grog stepped that first time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, yeah. The blade is still turned towards you. Doesn't seem to react.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I back up. Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You thinkers better think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to put the engineering behind it out. I want to put those pistons out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what if the pistons are fueling the fires, the forge?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We still can't see what's sending up those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not close enough, and you don't have a far enough view. It's blocking the bulk of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to fly to the side against the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about an Oracle Arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I was going to do, so I could shoot it around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you fly off to the side of the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm going to shoot an oracle arrow behind him to see what's going on over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a giveaway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wasn't even shooting at him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We poked it and we prodded it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a big package going out to a bunch of folks there. It's the complete black poisonwood set, which is awesome. It's the tray, the vault, the dice tower. Oh god, it's all falling. It might be a little broken; I apologize in advance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It smells of coffee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome back to Critical Role. So! First and foremost, our winner in the chat of the awesome collection of various Wyrmwood collectables is ProfessorJedi. Congratulations, ProfessorJedi. Danoba will contact you and get your information to get those to you ASAP. So congrats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, I've been flooded with tweets on where I got this shirt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the best shirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I was wearing it yesterday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were wearing it yesterday. The amazing Whitney Moore made it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This very shirt? This one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A more masculine cut of this exact shirt. Not that exact shirt, but another one very similar to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Although we do have a few shirts that we share and trade off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell us where to get it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For Human Peoples! I just tweeted it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can get a pin, you can get a hoodie, you can get any form you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know you, so I'll ask you later, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, then. So last we left off, you had made your way into the chamber that holds the Core Anvil beneath the underwater volcano of Scaldseat. Upon approaching the central risen platform where the anvil was, some stone-built guardian that loomed over it, upon approaching and testing the boundaries, an unintentional firing of an arrow in the vicinity seemed to have triggered an aggressive stance, and the entity seems to be on the assault. So now, with the chamber there before you, I would like you all to take stock on your current positions and roll initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's going to hit you like he is at a driving range!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, like tee-ball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm also rolling for my elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's really unfortunate. I get advantage on those, and that was terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So 25 to 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20. Jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. 20 to 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 to 15? For the love of god?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 15 to ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11 for my elemental.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11 for my elemental.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Six?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are fucked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. As the large forge guardian stands with its giant rune blade before it, Percival. You're up first. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make peace! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When the DM smirks like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to bake a pie and deliver it-- okay, I'm going to run back towards that red crystal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. I run that direction, and then I'm going to use my bonus action to do that. I'm going to hold my attack until his attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All right, that ends Percival's turn, holding his action to attack when it attacks. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM

And I'm going to get the fuck out of here. Five, ten, 15, 20, 25, 30, there. And that's it, I'm fucking blind and I ran because I can't see shit. Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. It's now its turn. It gets its legendary actions back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Can you inspire yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more to go. And as far as your peerless skill, you can add it to any ability check, yeah, so not a save, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the total?

lines.text: Is that including your dex save?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan gets pushed off the edge and falls prone (sizzling) into the molten metal below.

lines.text: Oh man. This is so bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like you're filling a playground with gravel right now. I feel like he's playing putt putt golf with us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he's strung us along on several battles to get all of our juice out.

lines.text: You take 53 points of fire damage, Scanlan, as you are currently now partially submerged in molten metal and screaming in horrible pain.

lines.text: The blindness fades as she touches you. Your vision comes back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. Okay. Do I have any more movement left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 15 minutes if it's a straight multiple people helping circumstance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have any more movement left?

lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could try.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I try pulling up the hammer and see if that does something? Okay, I'll try and pull the chain up to grab the hammer.

lines.text: Yeah, with your movement you get out. You're ten feet out of it. You're on fire still, but you're no longer melting in the lava. You're staring at its back. What are you doing?
